title: How to write a letter to the principal seeking admission in his school stating two strong reasons - Quora

response.answer_text: I would be very hesitant to write any letter without knowing the criteria for admission to the school. What if the criteria are: you need to be taller than 6 feet and less than 200 lbs? I also hope that it is not the principal alone who decides, but that’s another story. So: a) Find the criteria of admission b) if you meet two of them provide evidence that you do.
